scripts.clean:all: rm -rf .turbo && find . -type d \( -name 'node_modules' -o -name '.next' -o -name 'dist' -o -name '.turbo' -o -name '.cache' -o -name 'coverage' -o -name '.nyc_output' \) -prune -exec rm -rf '{}' + && find . -name '*.tsbuildinfo' -delete && find . -name '.env.local' -delete && echo 'ğŸ§¹ All caches and build artifacts cleaned!'
scripts.clean:cache: rm -rf .turbo && find . -type d \( -name '.next' -o -name 'dist' -o -name '.turbo' -o -name '.cache' -o -name 'coverage' -o -name '.nyc_output' \) -prune -exec rm -rf '{}' + && find . -name '*.tsbuildinfo' -delete && echo 'ğŸ§¹ Build caches cleaned!'
scripts.clean:modules: find . -type d -name 'node_modules' -prune -exec rm -rf '{}' + && echo 'ğŸ“¦ All node_modules directories removed!'
